# Bibliography

This document contains the complete bibliography for all NIH grant progress reports in this collection. All references cited in the progress reports are listed here in American Medical Association (AMA) format.

## Citation Management

References are managed using BibTeX format in the `references/progress-report-refs.bib` file. To add new references:

1. Add the BibTeX entry to the references file
2. Cite the reference in your document using standard Markdown citation syntax:
   - `[@smith2023developmental]` for parenthetical citations
   - `@smith2023developmental` for narrative citations

## Reference Formatting

References are formatted according to the American Medical Association (AMA) style, using the CSL file at `references/american-medical-association.csl`. This ensures consistency across all documents and compliance with NIH formatting requirements.
